about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I am an experienced FullStack developer with over four years of experience in creating effective web applications. My skills cover the entire development cycle, from concept and design to implementation and support.
about.paragraph2: I actively follow the latest trends in web development and am passionate about creating clean, efficient, and scalable code.
